name: Firefox: Bring the Title Back
description: Shows the tab title on top of the window. Compatible with Australis (Firefox 29).
additional_info: (12/12/2013) Styling for Windows 8. (09/12/2013) Compatibility with Australis (thanks user 146985 for testing and suggesting improvements). (07/07/2012) Fixed title centering. (19/01/2012) Compatibility with Firefox 12; Added styling for non-default Windows themes. (21/08/2011) Added hyphens to long titles. (20/04/2011) I forgot to do some changes related to the bugfix in the last update, so... (06/04/2011) (Partially) fixed a bug with Flash elements resetting upon resizing windows (see the forum discussion). Thanks user 51535 for pointing the issue and testing. (26/03/2011) Some fine-tuning for Aero Glass. (23/03/2011) Added title style options. Thanks user 600 for the suggestion. (22/03/2011) Fixed Personas text-shadow applying to title in Aero Basic. (02/03/2011) Added settings for Windows XP. (06/02/2011) Fixed page redraw issue when resizing window. (02/02/2011) Fixed issue with long titles overlapping toolbars. (29/01/2011) Added option to center the text. (10/01/2011) Fixed Panorama mode. (08/01/2011) Fixed Print Preview mode; Compatibility with tabs in titlebar.
